text:
"Eeh Sunghoon hyung berlebihan! aku hanya keluar sebentar tadi, dan aku minta maaf karena tadi tidak memberitahu kalian, maafkan aku sudah membuat kalian khawatir."
Mereka hanya tersenyum maklum, kemudian tatapan mereka menumpuk pada Jay yang sedaritadi diam saja, pria manis itu bersandar pada kepala sofa dengan tatapan yang sulit di artikan, membuat para member mengambil kesimpulan kalau Jay dan Sunoo sedang tidak baik saja.
(^. _. ^)ﾉ☆
Akhirnya mereka pulang dari acara hari itu, dua van putih berisikan member melaju pelan membelah kota Seoul di sore hari, nampak Jake yang sedari tadi bingung menatap Jay, lelaki itu hanya menatap keluar jendela menampilkan sungai Han yang sore itu dengan apiknya memantulkan cahaya jingga berkilauan, siapapun yang melihat itu pastilah menjadi senang, tapi sepertinya hal itu tak mempan dengan Jay, Jay yang dalam kondisi pikiran berisiknya hanya terus melamun.
trans:
"Eeh, Sunghoon hyung is being dramatic! I just stepped out for a moment, and I apologize for not informing you earlier, I'm sorry for making you worry."
They smiled understandingly, and then their gazes turned to Jay who had been silent all this time, the sweet man leaned against the head of the sofa with a look that was difficult to interpret, leading the members to conclude that Jay and Sunoo were not in a good place.
(^. _. ^)ﾉ☆
Finally they returned home from the day's event, two white vans carrying the members drove slowly through the streets of Seoul in the afternoon, Jake who had been confused was staring at Jay, the man just gazed out the window at the Han River which that afternoon beautifully reflected the sparkling orange light anyone who saw it would surely feel joy, but it didn't seem to work on Jay, who lost in a tumultuous train of thought continued to daydream.
